prompt: Retrieve the email and phone number of all patients.
Find the first and last names of all patients who have visited the clinic more than 5 times.
response: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE number_of_visits > 5);

prompt: Get the medical record number of patients who registered at the clinic before 2020.
response: SELECT medical_record_number FROM clinic_info WHERE date_of_registration < '2020-01-01';

prompt: Retrieve the email addresses of patients who have not visited the clinic since 2019.
response: SELECT email FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE last_visit_date < '2020-01-01');

prompt: Find the first and last names of patients who have never visited the clinic.
response: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE number_of_visits > 0);

prompt: Retrieve the phone numbers of patients who visited the clinic for the first time in 2021.
response: SELECT phone FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE date_of_registration >= '2021-01-01' AND date_of_registration <= '2021-12-31');

prompt: Get the medical record numbers of patients who have visited the clinic more than 10 times.
response: SELECT medical_record_number FROM clinic_info WHERE number_of_visits > 10;

prompt: Find the email addresses of patients who last visited the clinic in 2020.
response: SELECT email FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE last_visit_date >= '2020-01-01' AND last_visit_date <= '2020-12-31');

prompt: Retrieve the phone numbers of patients who have not visited the clinic in the last two years.
response: SELECT phone FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE last_visit_date < '2020-01-01');

prompt: Find the first and last names of patients who registered at the clinic in the last six months.
response: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE date_of_registration >= (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 months'));

prompt: Retrieve the medical record numbers of patients who have visited the clinic exactly 3 times.
response: SELECT medical_record_number FROM clinic_info WHERE number_of_visits = 3;

prompt: Find the first and last names of patients who have visited the clinic only once.
response: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE number_of_visits = 1);

prompt: Retrieve the phone numbers of patients who have visited the clinic more than 20 times.
response: SELECT phone FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE number_of_visits > 20);

prompt: Find the email addresses of patients who have not visited the clinic in the last year.
response: SELECT email FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE last_visit_date < (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 year'));

prompt: Find the medical record number of patients who last visited the clinic before 2019.
response: SELECT medical_record_number FROM clinic_info WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT id FROM patients WHERE id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM clinic_info WHERE last_visit_date < '2019-01-01'));
